product.title: Solios Watches - The Solar White - Silver Mesh & Silver Case
product.body_html:
The Solios Solar Watch perfectly combines aesthetic, green technology, and durable materials. The 8mm thin silver-colored 316L stainless steel case is topped by a White dial with a minimalist style and offers a water-resistance of 3 ATM. The hardened mineral glass is covered with a robust sapphire crystal to limit scratches. At the heart, a solar cell allows the watch to recharge by itself and offers a 6-month energy reserve. In addition to promoting slow fashion with style, you'll never have to change your battery. The Silver mesh metal strap offers a thick and eco-friendly coloring. The clip attachment allows the bracelet to perfectly fit any type of wrist.
Solios also commits to restoring one acre of rainforest for every watch sold. That’s what we call a small accessory that comes with a big impact.
